changes: Added QuickPlay System for worlds and servers from components
Added Instance Settings screen to manage memory, resolution and java arguments
Added Component Settings screen to manage included files
Added sort options to mods manager
Input fields with errors now hide the error once the input is changed
After an update the option to close the launcher was replaced with the option to restart
Adjusted the in-game strings to display the instance name more prominently
Closing the launcher with a close request (pressing the x button) is now unavailable if unsafe (while an instance is running or login is in progress)
fixes: The default language now matches the system language
Mod Update Selectors now save their values over restarts
Improved Popup System to make it more reliable
Improved several UI elements to make them consistent, faster and more reliable
